ygData.subject: Clerics Rule
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail all, my name is Lowlap Dancer and I m an addict.I started using EQ about 6 mos. ago. At first it appears to be a harmless game to while away the lonley
ygData.messageBody:
Hail all, my name is Lowlap Dancer and I'm an
addict.I started "using" EQ about 6 mos. ago. At first it
appears to be a harmless game to while away the lonley
hours. Befor you know what hit you you're hooked. I have
quit my job and often neglect my cats, ow the shame of
it all. If you see me wondering aimlessly through
Grater Faydark or the Estate of Unrest,please have pitty
on me and give a "Hail"( a SoW would be nice to).
